text:
Rachel Lynn Matthews (born October 25, 1993) is an American actress. She is best known for starring as Danielle Bouseman in the movies "Happy Death Day" (2017) and "Happy Death Day 2U" (2019). Both movies were directed by her uncle, Christopher Landon. In 2019, she also appeared in "Frozen II", "Batwoman" and "Looking for Alaska".
Matthews was born in Los Angeles, California. Her mother is actress Leslie Landon. In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Matthews tested positive for COVID-19.
